text: a few blocks behind me Parliament just
voted to pass these austerity measures
that will give tax hikes and wage cuts
to Greece very unpopular measures their
people have been demonstrating all day
we spoken to several people after the
vote who are really angry especially
young people and I don't
there's tear gas wafting through the
crowd the police have been firing all
day demonstrators have come out prepared
for battle basically they put white male
locks on their face it helps against the
tear gas they carry gas masks it's
almost like street battles here
everything came down to a very narrow
vote the Socialists were able to pass
these unpopular measures the measures
will impose tax hikes and wage cuts on
the Greek people as part of a package
that the European Union European Central
Bank and International Monetary Fund
Greece's foreign lenders have made the
country do in order to get an emergency
loan that will help keep the country
from defaulting immediately
